message: Guys, I'm overwhelmed by choice available on the interwebz. I need a simple wordpress popup plugin that allows me to write custom HTML content for the pop up and set a delay time (to allow visitors to read the page before showing the pop up). Anyone has some personal favourites for this?

data.message: A few disclaimers: I really appreciate it if you are going to google the topic for me, but I'd appreciate personal picks more than promising google results, as I have been trying several of those now and got tired of random tries. Also, if you think the entire pop up thing is bad, then I have a lot of explanation to do, but that's not the topic of the question. Just move on.
